skill.name: cross-task-learning
skill.description: Pattern for aggregating insights across multiple tasks to enable data-driven evolution.
skill.summary: Pattern for aggregating insights across multiple tasks to enable data-driven evolution.
skill.author: Clouder0

security_audit.summary: Pure documentation/markdown skill with no executable code. File access is limited to the skill's own data directory (memory/reflections/) for JSON persistence. No network access, no command execution, no environment variable access. Purpose matches stated capabilities.

content.value_statement: Individual task reflections capture isolated learnings. This skill aggregates insights across all tasks to identify recurring patterns, effective strategies, and system improvements. It enables data-driven evolution of your AI workflows.
actual_capabilities: Aggregates task learnings into a single JSON file
Tracks strategy effectiveness across multiple tasks
Identifies recurring failure patterns and bottlenecks
Discovers skill candidates from repeated successful patterns
Provides query patterns for analyzing aggregated data
Implements threshold-based actions for system improvements
limitations: Only works with other DotAgent skills that generate reflections
Does not execute code or modify system files
Cannot integrate with external data sources
Requires consistent reflection output format to function correctly

use_cases.title: Track team patterns
use_cases.description: Identify which strategies consistently succeed or fail across all team member tasks.

use_cases.title: Detect system weaknesses
use_cases.description: Find recurring bottlenecks and failure patterns that indicate architectural improvements needed.

use_cases.title: Prioritize fixes
use_cases.description: Rank issues by occurrence frequency and severity to focus on highest-impact improvements.

prompt_templates.title: Check effectiveness
prompt_templates.prompt: How effective has the strategy 'spawn parallel explorers for context' been across all tasks?

prompt_templates.title: Find failure patterns
prompt_templates.prompt: What failure patterns have occurred more than twice? List the top 5 by severity.

prompt_templates.title: Skill candidates
prompt_templates.prompt: Which patterns have been identified as skill candidates with frequency >= 5?

prompt_templates.title: Evolution roadmap
prompt_templates.prompt: Analyze all aggregated data and propose the top 3 priorities for system evolution based on recurring issues and high-value skill candidates.

best_practices: Write reflections immediately after completing each task to maintain data accuracy
Use fuzzy matching to avoid duplicating similar patterns across tasks
Review aggregated data weekly to identify emerging trends early
anti_patterns: Analyzing tasks in isolation without checking aggregate data first
Ignoring patterns with low occurrence counts that may indicate systemic issues
Over-aggregating data until it loses actionable insights

faq.question: Which platforms support this skill?
faq.answer: Compatible with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code. Requires the DotAgent framework.

faq.question: How many tasks can it analyze?
faq.answer: Unlimited. The system tracks all tasks and trims history to the last 20 entries while maintaining aggregate statistics.

faq.question: How does it integrate with other skills?
faq.answer: Works with Reflector to write reflections and Evolver to read aggregated data for system improvements.

faq.question: Is my data safe?
faq.answer: Yes. All data is stored locally in memory/reflections/_aggregate.json with no network access or external data sharing.

faq.question: Why are similar patterns merging incorrectly?
faq.answer: Check that patterns use consistent naming. The similarity matching normalizes text but may merge similar concepts if terminology varies.

faq.question: How is this different from single-task reflection?
faq.answer: Single-task reflection captures task-specific learnings. Cross-task learning aggregates across all tasks to identify system-wide patterns and trends.
